<h3 id="X37000">X(37000) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: REFLECTIONS-OF-(A,B,C)-IN-X(55) TO REFLECTIONS-OF-X(55)-IN-(A,B,C)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^7-3*(b+c)*a^6-5*(b^2+c^2)*a^5+(b+c)*(5*b^2-2*b*c+5*c^2)*a^4+(b^2-c^2)^2*a^3-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(37000) = 3*X(2)-4*X(32613) = 3*X(4)-4*X(7680) = 3*X(4)-2*X(36999) = 3*X(55)-2*X(7680) = 3*X(55)-X(36999) = 3*X(376)-2*X(3428) = 5*X(631)-4*X(2886) = 2*X(2099)-3*X(7967) = 7*X(3090)-8*X(6690) = 5*X(3091)-4*X(18407) = 2*X(3419)-3*X(5657) = 3*X(3524)-2*X(31140) = 11*X(3525)-10*X(31245) = 2*X(4847)-3*X(21165) = 3*X(5603)-4*X(24929)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(36999)</p>
<p>X(37000) lies on these lines:
{1,6934}, {2,32613}, {3,3434}, {4,12}, {5,18499}, {8,6868}, {10,6936}, {11,6880}, {20,145}, {30,10679}, {35,6833}, {40,12625}, {56,10806}, {100,6827}, {104,376}, {355,6872}, {377,10267}, {390,5603}, {452,5818}, {497,6905}, {515,1709}, {516,18446}, {631,2886}, {674,6776}, {946,4309}, {962,6869}, {971,36976}, {1001,6854}, {1006,2550}, {1072,3749}, {1376,6947}, {1385,4190}, {1479,6796}, {1486,36009}, {1512,3586}, {1519,9580}, {1532,9668}, {1621,6826}, {1824,7487}, {2099,4293}, {2478,11499}, {3052,5721}, {3058,10596}, {3086,5172}, {3090,6690}, {3091,18407}, {3149,7956}, {3295,10532}, {3303,10597}, {3419,5657}, {3436,7491}, {3524,31140}, {3525,31245}, {3534,30283}, {3576,6955}, {3583,6968}, {3616,6885}, {3652,15680}, {3746,26332}, {3913,11827}, {3925,6878}, {4297,22837}, {4299,5882}, {4317,13607}, {4330,5691}, {4847,21165}, {5217,6977}, {5218,6830}, {5225,6941}, {5248,6832}, {5281,6844}, {5432,6879}, {5552,6928}, {5587,6976}, {5687,31789}, {5731,6948}, {5759,15733}, {5768,9778}, {5840,6925}, {6244,34707}, {6836,11248}, {6837,18517}, {6838,10525}, {6853,31418}, {6871,26487}, {6875,19843}, {6889,10902}, {6890,26285}, {6899,10310}, {6910,26470}, {6929,18524}, {6933,31659}, {6946,26105}, {6949,10591}, {6954,11680}, {6957,18491}, {6967,25440}, {6984,10198}, {6992,26446}, {7354,10805}, {7681,9670}, {10386,20420}, {10526,10528}, {10529,26286}, {10993,35238}, {11240,22765}, {12114,15338}, {12246,12249}, {12247,20095}, {12513,30264}, {12699,33597}, {18533,30273}, {26386,26422}, {26398,26410}
</p>
<p>
X(37000) = midpoint of X(20) and X(20075)<br>
X(37000) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 55), (3434, 3), (6938, 4302), (18499, 5), (25415, 5882), (36999, 7680)<br>
X(37000) = anticomplement of X(37820)<br>
X(37000) = anticomplement of the anticomplement of X(32613)<br>
X(37000) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 12116, 10785), (4, 3085, 10599), (4, 11491, 10786), (20, 944, 37002), (55, 36999, 7680), (1479, 6796, 6834), (1479, 6834, 10598), (3058, 22753, 10596), (3149, 15171, 10531), (6253, 11496, 4), (6284, 11500, 4), (6928, 32141, 5552), (6987, 17784, 5657), (7680, 36999, 4), (12953, 18242, 4), (26381, 26405, 1)<br>
</p>
